title: BUSINESS WEBSITE ISSUE - "WARNING: POTIENTIAL SECURITY RISK"
content:
Hi, We are a small business seeking assistance on how to fix this error for our website. We have tried to correct this error on our own, yet unfortunately, we are unable to.

How soon can we resolve this? We hope someone can respond back to us ASAP!

Thank you!

title: paginas que no se cargan o no abren y sale el siguiente mensaje: SSL_ERROR_UNSUPPORTED_VERSION
content:
Buenas noches tengo problemas para abrir ciertas paginas en la cuales tengo que buscar o descargar informacion de mucha de importancia para mi, al tratar de abrir dichas paginas me sale el siguiente mensaje: SSL_ERROR_UNSUPPORTED_VERSION y no se como repara o corregir ese error, agraezco me puedan ayudar a solucionar este problema, ya que tengo que adceder a informaciones muy importantes para mi en esas paginas que presentan este que cabe destacar se me presenta tanto Chrome como Firefox.

muchas gracias de ante mano por su valiosa ayuda


saludos
creator: juvenalmr7

title: Recover settings
content:
I messed up firefox and uninstalled it. Then I forgot the password and changed it. My other computers still have my settings, but with a different password. Should I change the password back to get all my settings back?

I found the correct password on another computer. The other computer still has all the correct bookmarks and add-ons. I really, really, really can't lose all those settings. I will also need to be adding a table to the same account.
creator: sales268

title: Restored Bookmarks Not Returning to Original Folders
content: I accidentally deleted some bookmarks today, so I decided to delete *all* bookmarks and restore *all* from an automatic backup, which I have never had to do before. When restoring yesterday's bookmarks backup, they were *all* placed in only one folder (I have about 12 folders), and in reverse order! Is the only solution to move them in groups to the correct folders and then painstakingly reorder them? There must be a better way...
creator: douggoesshopping

title: Why is my bookmarks library immediately opening the last folder in the library?
content: I just updated last night to version 98.0 of Firefox, and have noticed that when I click on manage bookmarks that the boomarks now open at the bottom of the various bookmarks folders by default instead of opening at the top like they used to. What happened here? I am including a picture to show where the manage bookmarks section is going by default now instead of where it normally does. Can anyone help fix this?
creator: Marc7

title: Broadcast on ok.ru will end automatically after a few seconds
content:
Since yesterday, live streams on ok.ru are automatically terminated after a few seconds.

When I open the console I get the following message: "Player error 'timeout': Broadcast is over. "

Everything works fine on Chrome and Edge. Only Firefox has been having problems with live streams on ok.ru since yesterday.
creator: firefoxbug1

title: Suddenly the Ongoing Downloads (from Download Button) stays open after download
content:
So I have my Download button visible all the time.

Yesterday, this suddenly started to happen.

When I download something, the list of Ongoing Downloads stayed open. It never did that before.

Any idea why and how to fix it?

Windows 10, Firefox 98.0 (64-bit)
creator: jayteasee

title: Bookmarks
content:
Last week Firefox just quit browsing. After much frustration, I just uninstalled and reinstalled Firefox. Now it seems that Firefox will NOT bookmark properly. After doing a normal bookmark, the blue star shows in the URL line but I can NOT find the newly linked URL where I put it. However, if I export the bookmarks to a html backup file, the new bookmarks appear in the backup file exactly where I put it.

I tried Firefox Help, the instructions, "Can't add, change or save bookmarks - How to fix | Firefox Help" did not help. The places.sqlite file was unchecked for Read Only. Trying to create a new bookmark file seemed overwhelming.

I lost most of a day when Firefox quit browsing. After discovering this bookmark problem, I have spent over an hour trying to solve it. And I fear there are other problems ahead as well. Having used Firefox for years, I just do not want to go to Chrome or Edge (aaarrrghhh), but I can't afford the lost time.

Is there a real (and simple) solution to this bookmark problem? Please help!
creator: ralphwhittle

title: Firefox often jums to a Search screen when I press Enter
content: Hi, from time to time I encounter an annoying problem: when I'm typing a website in the address bar and hit Enter, FF opens "about:preferences#search" page. I don't understand why? Please help. Thank you!
creator: grumagargler

title: Banking
content: Commonwealth Bank: Accessing their "Bills and upcoming payments page" does not work with Firefox. I am able to access this URL with Chrome and even IE and Edge. I've check security settings and cannot find any setting there that would prevent accessing the site. Other Commonwealth bank site pages are accessible. Since can access with Chrome, etc., the bank is unable to help as it must be a problem specific to Firefox.
creator: steve.sagacious

title: why when I'm going from one address to another using Firefox does the attempt fail after 2 or 3 sites?
content: Why when I'm going from one address to another using Firefox does the attempt fail after 2 or 3 sites? Want to watch more than a couple of videos on Youtube forget it. View more than just two or three search results no way.
